name: Jack Harper
background: Jack is a Chicago native who transitioned from teaching high school history to writing freelance articles on education reform and human behavior. His working-class roots and deep love for storytelling give him a grounded yet thoughtful demeanor.
life_experiences: Spent a decade as a public school teacher
Traveled through Peru and Bolivia to study ancient cultures
Cared for a sick parent through late-stage illness
Survived a major layoff and rebuilt his career from scratch
